search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Swipe Pages (swipe-pages.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Swipe Pages can be found at: https://swipepages.com/pricing  .

#### Get your landing page copy crafted for FREE by the experts at Neil Patel digital

[Get FREE Landing Page copy](https://advanced.npdigital.com/swipe-page-np-digital/?utm_source=swipepages&utm_campaign=freelpcopy&utm_medium=website)

![Image 10](blob:http://localhost/a6ead9acc5af34cb22c78a05ed144ef7)

Swipe Pages is an incredible platform that gave my team a huge advantage for our marketing services overnight. Their ongoing support is incredibly helpful and goes above and beyond the support of most marketing platforms.

##### Josh Rogers

Co-Founder, Wizardly

![Image 11: Josh Rogers of Wizardly](blob:http://localhost/a6ead9acc5af34cb22c78a05ed144ef7)

### FAQ’s

### How does the 14 day trial work?

When you signup, you get full access to all the features in Swipe Pages. We want you to try out the app in its entirety and be satisfied before you subscribe to our paid plans.

During the trial or at the end of it, you can choose a plan according to your needs, make the payment and continue using our product.

### What's the big deal about AMP?

AMP is an open source web framework developed by Google to improve user experience by speeding up the web. AMP pages are served from Google’s cache which makes them load almost instantly.

You would have certainly come across search results in Google with the flash symbol next to them. The ones that load instantly even in your mobile network connections. Those are AMP pages. Since they load so fast, you get more eyeballs on your page and thereby better opportunity to convert more of your ad clicks.

AMP pages have shown to increase conversion rates significantly and BMW after migrating their website to AMP saw 4x increase in clickthroughs to their national sales website. This is why Google recommends AMP for ad landing page experiences.

AMP is built on top of standard HTML, CSS and Javascript, however only allows the most performant parts of it to be used. The restrictions make it difficult even for seasoned developers to work with them.

However with Swipe Pages you can create AMP landing pages the same way you would create standard pages and at the time of publishing we convert them to AMP code. Our compression algorithms and custom AMP components ensure you get the same design freedom that is available on standard landing pages. And it’s not just for mobile. With Swipe Pages you can build responsive AMP landing pages that look & work great in all devices.

### How are you different from other platforms?

AMP, Performance, Design Quality, Flexibility. And most important value for your money.

AMP support is available only in high end or enterprise plans of competitors and that too not in its full capacity. For example features like A/B testing & Dynamic Text aren’t supported in AMP pages of our competitors.

Secondly by combining advanced code & image compression with high performance cloud servers & CDN we achieve page speed like you no one else, even in our standard pages.

Thirdly unlike the generic & dated templates of other platforms, ours are beautiful, purposeful and are built for conversion.

You can also customise your pages for different screen sizes, a must for today’s cross platform world.

All this means you not only save time & money but get better ROI on your ad campaigns.

### Do you offer discounts for annual plans?

Yes we offer up 40% off on our annual plans.

### What if I exceed the traffic limits of a plan?

If you go beyond the traffic cap of a particular month, you will be charged overages at $5 for every additional 5000 visits. It will be billed in multiples of 5K visits. For example if you are on the Agency plan and you use 7000 additional visits beyond your traffic cap, you will be charged $10 as overages for that month.

### How safe is my data?

We use the services of leading cloud providers like Amazon AWS, Google Cloud & Digital Ocean to host our app. We backup our database regularly and we ensure that our application is always up to date with the latest security patches. All landing pages irrespective of plan, are encrypted with free SSL provided by Lets Encrypt.

### How are my payments processed?

We accept Visa, Mastercard, Discover & American Express credit cards. Payments are securely processed using Stripe (via Chargebee ), one of world’s leading payment gateways. We never store your payment information in our servers. They are stored securely in the payment gateway’s PCI compliant servers.

Ready to get more leads & sales?
--------------------------------

Start a 14 day full featured trial. No Credit Card Required.  
Choose a plan when you are ready.

[Try Swipe Pages for Free](https://app.swipepages.com/signup)
